data.oai_dc:dc: Water Levels from the Taylor Slough, just outside the Everglades National Park, South Florida from October 1997 to December 2004
Water level is recorded at least hourly at TS/Ph4 and TS/Ph5. Water level is measured with acoustic water level gages that digitally record relative water height relative to the local soil surface.
water level|Taylor Slough|Everglades National Park|long-term monitoring|abiotic|hydrology|wetland inundation regimes|1997|2004
